properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 1 at 3:59PM AKST until February 2 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to 10 inches. The highest snowfall totals are expected
from Dillingham west. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will
reduce visibilities to one half mile or less. The strongest
winds are expected along the coast.

* WHERE...North and west of King Salmon.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 5 PM AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
for snow and blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited
due to a combination of falling and blowing snow. Use caution when
traveling, especially in open areas.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 5 PM AKST SUNDAY NORTH AND WEST OF KING SALMON
